text:
Evaluating expressions with order of operations, ((a^2)/4b)+c When a=12, b=9 and c=4

\begin{aligned}\n&\begin{array}{l}\na=12, b=9, c=4 \\\n\frac{0}{5} \\\n\text { Evaluate },\left(a^{2} \div 4 b\right)+c\n\end{array}\\\n&4\n\end{aligned}[imath]a=12, b=9, c=4 [/imath] [imath]\frac{0}{5} [/imath] [imath]\text { Evaluate },\left(a^{2} \div 4 b\right)+c[/imath]
